website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, clear set of 2 rechargeable active shutter glasses that are suitable for all 3D DLP-Link projectors.
pros: of charging time, these glasses can be used for up to 30 hrs
They're equipped with automatic standby, run, and auto-off features to conserve battery power, and they come with a 30-day refund policy
cons: Initially, there can be problems with syncing, but you can select Invert during setup to solve this problem

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 2 work
customer_reviews.text: One of the 2 pairs did not work. Unfortunately I did not find this out until after the 30 day return window had closed. I did not get my projector up until this past weekend. The one pair that does work seems to function as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it along with the mini projector. Since it is same brand, it would make it easier to set up. The quality is nice and shaped. It’s nice that Each glasses that comes along with usb charger and bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brandom

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for perfect glasses for your projector
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and linked right up to projector with no problems better picture quality then glasses that came with projector and I think there a perfect size and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: todd mccullough

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Dknt work. Dnt buy. Picture is no different. And hurts ur eyes
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to watch Avatar in 3D,. They work great, movie is better in 3D.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: I got it this morning. I immediately experienced what it felt like to watch a movie at home with 3D GLASSES!!!!!As long as you're watching a 3D movie and it's HD,Put yourself in their shoes,very realistic!
customer_reviews.author: Mathea

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The picture quality is realy good. clear and bright And the price
customer_reviews.author: Negropanzon

customer_reviews.title: Product does not match image descriptions!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not match images in description! Charge port is under nose bridge, not on top like it shows in images!!.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Price is right two pairs for $19.99🤩
customer_reviews.text: To be honest i love the price you get 2 pairs for $19.99 which is a good deal the 3D glasses show super clear when glasses is off but on it’s still a little dark also the 3D glasses is very lightweight and comfortable also the frame is the same color as what you see on the Amazon photo🥰
customer_reviews.author: The Movie King👑  (Todd Smith)

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is quite suitable for my face, it feels good
customer_reviews.author: dada

product_meta.title: APEMAN 3D Glasses Ultra-Clear HD 144 Hz DLP Link 3D Active Rechargeable Shutter Glasses for All 3D DLP-Link Projectors - Two Pack
product_meta.description:
APEMAN 3D glasses DPL series are well designed product. The glasses are compatible with all 3D projectors, which offers you the convenience of enjoying 3D videos and pictures at home with various projectors. You cannot miss it if you are just looking for a good pair of 3D glasses.

Product Features

Triple Flash: Preventing overexertion of your eyes

High contrast and high brightness

Supporting various types of flashes, compatible with all 3D DLP projectors

Connection in less than 1 second

Automatic R/L calibration

100 % flash coverage, unaltered colors, black stays black

Zero flicker-technology: No sync loss or "flickering"

178° Signal Receiver: Ghosting-free pictures from almost all perspectives

UV Filter: Usable at daylight

Scratch-proof covered LCDs

Functions: Automatic detection, standby, run, auto-off

High Performance Battery: Rapid charging function

Huge LCD Lenses (peripheral view undisturbed)

Fitting perfectly on prescription spectacles

Specifications

Weight: 32 grams

Contrast: 1200/1

Frequency Range: 96Hz / 100Hz / 120Hz / 144Hz

Synchronization: DLP link

Duration of Use: 30 hours

Charging Duration: 2 hours

Warranty

Limited 12 months warranty from date of purchase.
feature_bullets: 【Reliable Quality】Best Price and Best Value for 3D Glasses. upgrade version Ultra Clear 144Hz Refresh Rate, high contrast and high brightness.
【Portability】Bring them along anywhere you can use them. Two pairs in the box so you can enjoy them as a couple, or get two sets with a discount for the whole family.
【3D Viewing】: 3D quality and effects, let you feel like a cinema,it is also easy can be charging. 2 hours charging for 30 hours use.
【Automatic Detection】: Automatically standby, run and auto-off. Keep them good for years to come.
【Warranty】: Every Apeman product includes a 30-day refund & 12-month warranty(Under the premise that the product has any quality issues).
